meanings.definition: The quality of being fruity or resembling fruit.
meanings.sent1: The fruitiness of the smoothie made it a refreshing treat.
meanings.sent2: I love the fruitiness of the fresh strawberries in this salad.
meanings.sent3: The fruitiness of the pineapple on the pizza added a tropical twist.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a contagious fruitiness that brightened everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: The fruitiness of the perfume lingered in the air long after she had left.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of having a fruity flavor or aroma.
meanings.sent1: The fruitiness of the wine was evident in its sweet aroma.
meanings.sent2: The fruitiness of the smoothie came from the ripe mangoes blended in.
meanings.sent3: The fruitiness of the air freshener made the room smell like a fruit basket.
meanings.sent4: The fruitiness of the candle filled the room with a delightful scent.
meanings.sent5: The fruitiness of the dish made it a perfect summer dessert.
